instruction.instruction_text: Please head up to the second floor and wait for me by the sink.
Please go to the first floor, stop on the right side of the long sofa, and wait for me.
Please go to the first-floor bedroom and stop by the window.
Go up the stairs, please wait for me halfway on the stairs, just beside the handrails.
Please head to the desk on the second floor, where you can work and study.
Go down the stairs all the way to the bottom, then stop next to the black car and wait for me.
Head to the second floor, by the wooden stairs and the bike, and wait for me.
Please go to the third floor and stop by the bed in the bedroom with the sports star figure.
Could you head up to the top floor and wait for me by the shoe cabinet? I need to get my shoes on to head out.
Please go to the bottom floor of the house, stop behind the brown sofa, and face the TV.
Please go to the first floor, then to the laundry room, and stop right in front of the washing machine. I need to do laundry.
Please go to the third floor of the house, walk to the very end of the hallway, and stop in front of the microwave; a computer desk and a clock will be on your left.
Leave the room, go downstairs, and wait for me next to the toilet in the bathroom on your right.
Go up to the second floor, walk to the end of the stairs, then go all the way down the hallway to its end, and stop next to the two beds.
Head up to the top floor, stop by the bookshelf and the cello, and you'll get a beautiful view from there.
Go down the stairs on your right, all the way to the living room on the lowest floor, and stop between the two sofas, near the delicious food on the table.
Find the nearest stairs, go upstairs, stop halfway up the stairs, and face the two chairs.
Go up two floors, stop at the end of the stairs, and you'll see a beautiful view outside the window.
Go downstairs, walk into the solid wood-style bedroom, and stop by the window side of the bed.
Go downstairs, into the kitchen, and stop right in front of the fridge and oven.
Please go upstairs to the white bedroom, go into the bathroom, and stop next to the toilet.
Please go to the living room on the bottom floor of the house, stop between the sofa and the TV, and face the TV.
Please go up the stairs and stop in the middle of the stairs. There is a decorative mirror next to you.
Please go to the bathroom on the first floor and wait for me deep inside the bathroom.
Please go to the bedroom on the second floor and wait for me by the window of the children's room with a teddy bear.
Please go upstairs to the second floor, into the room on your right, and stop in the corner.
Please go to the kitchen on the first floor, stop by the sink and range hood, facing the window.
Please go to the living room on the first floor and wait for me behind the brown sofa that's parallel to the TV. The fireplace will be on your front right.
Please go to the restroom on the top floor and wait for me by the toilet.
Please go to the bathroom on the lowest floor and stop in front of the mirror, on the left.
Please go upstairs and wait for me in front of the bookshelf on the second floor.
Go to the bottom of the house and stop at the entrance door to the outside world and wait for me.
Please head over to the Apple computer on the desk on the second floor and stop behind it.
Please head over to the Apple computer on the desk on the second floor and stop behind it.
Please go up one floor, face the window, and stop next to the gym equipment. There's a TV above your head.
Please go to the bottom floor of the room, enter the bathroom in the bedroom, and stop next to the triangular bathtub.
Please go to the bottom floor of the room, enter the bedroom next to the other door, and park next to the blue ocean style wardrobe.
Please go to the top floor, walk to the bedroom at the end of the hallway, and stop in the empty room of the bedroom to wait for me.
Please go to the top floor and walk into the bedroom with yellow patterned sheets. Stop by the bed and wait for me.
Please go to the bathroom on the first floor and stop inside to wait for me.
Please go to the second floor and stop by the two red chairs to wait for me. You can see a fire stove beside you.
Please stop by the table of six people on the top floor and wait for me. Stand against the wall.
Please go to the kitchen on the third floor and stop between the refrigerator and the black cabinet to wait for me.
Please go to the highest floor and enter the room directly facing the end of the stairs. Stop by the balcony deep inside the room and wait for me.
Go downstairs, cross the kitchen, enter the gray toned room, stop in front of the TV, and next to you are the blinds.
Please stop and wait for me in the restroom on the first floor.
Please wait for me in the mosaic-tiled bathroom on the top floor, located inside the bedroom on the left at the end of the stairs.
Please go to the bottom of the house and stop by the toilet on the right-hand side of the stairs.
Please find the stairs and stop in the middle area of the stairs to wait for me.
Please find the stairs, walk to the first floor, and stop next to the outdoor sofa on the first floor.
Please pass through the living room and wait for me on the first floor, near the sofa and fireplace.
Please go to the bedside of the bedroom on the first floor and wait there.
Please come upstairs to this bedroom and stand between the double bed and the single bed.
Please go to the topmost bathroom and wait near the the corner shower.
Please stop on the mid-stair landing at the turn, facing the white wall and the window's vertical blinds, near the black metal handrail.
Please go to the first-floor kitchen area near the island and wait for me; I'll meet you in the open space by the stove.
Please pause around the mid-landing and turning point of the stairs, next to the wall vent, and wait for me.
Please go to the living room on the first floor and sit on the white sofa near the colorful throw pillows.
Go to the topmost master bedroom and wait by the lamp which is farther from the window; the two bedside lamps can help you mark the spot.
Go upstairs and walk beside the sofa, and you need to stop near the fireplace.
Please go to the second-floor kitchen and wait for me by the stove, standing on the mat in front of the oven where you can see the black refrigerator and microwave.
Please go to the lowest level foyer near the end of the carpeted area, stand there facing the wooden door.
Go to the master bathroom on the first floor and wait at the edge of the bathtub near the window.
Please go upstairs to the room above and wait for me at the doorway of the bedroom with white-colored style and decorative tapestry by the window.
Please go up to the second floor and stop in the bedroom near the red rug and the bunk bed.
Please walk all the way down the stairs and stop by the black sofa in front of them.
Please wait for me on the first floor at the raised tiled hearth beside the fireplace, close to the red ottoman and patterned rug edge.
Head to the red bedroom on the second floor and wait next to the small white bed.
Please go upstairs and walk through hallway, go to the bathroom and wait by the window next to the large bathtub.
Please go to the bedroom on the second floor and wait at the bed under the ceiling fan. You can see a blue chair beside the bed.
Please stop on the small landing midway up the stairs, standing close to the handrail to look around.
Please go to the first-floor living room and wait beside the large black sofa near the coffee table.
Please come upstairs to the room with deep red walls, light hardwood floor and stand by the side near the framed pictures.
Pause on the mid-stair steps near the wall art on the left, and use the light from the window to look outside the window.
Please go to the first-floor nursery room with a large window on the right and stop near the nursery bed.
Go to the bedroom with a large painting featuring ocean on the first floor, standing near the door of that room.
Go upstairs to the hallway window and wait there, where you can see the kitchen and a small table island in the center.
Please go to the topmost workspace area and sit on the window-side seat with a computer.
Please go to the bathroom on the first floor and wait for me in front of the sink mirror, just beside three abstract paintings.
Go upstairs to the floor above and stop by the desk in the corridor, facing two gray sofas.
Please go through the second floor and stop at the doorway of the similar storage area, near the wall where a coat is hanging.
Move to the higher side by the window on the middle of the stairs, look down over the stairwell and stand close to the railing edge.
Go to the top-level restroom, stand by the sink facing the mirror and observe the surroundings.
Please go upstairs to the doorway of the room with a small L-shaped kitchen and darker cabinets at the top of the stairs.
Go to the first floor and walk through the hallway, stop at an empty room with a window on the wall.
Head to the bathroom on the first floor near the stairs, stop near the mirror.
Walk along the stairs all the way to the end, stop outside the bathroom door on an empty space and wait for further instructions.
Go to the second floor and stop near the stacked washer and dryer.
Head to the purple long coach by the window on the first floor, near the radiator under the window.
Go to the kitchen on the lowest floor in the building, and stop near the washing machine.
Walk up the stairs all the way to the top, and stop in the hallway beneath a electric fan.
Go to the kitchen and stop near a stainless double sink on the first floor.
Head to the living room and stop near a fire stove on the lowest floor.
Go all the way to the highest floor and walk through the hallway. You need to stop in an empty room beneath the light.
Please walk along the staircase to its end, stop in the lowest courtyard area, and look outside the sliding glass door.
Head to the two white doors on the lowest floor.
Go to the toilet with blue-colored wall on the second floor.
Head to the highest floor in the building and stop near the doorside near the staircase.
Please head to the first floor, to the cozy living room area right by the stone fireplace.
Go to the billiard room on the first floor, which is the room with the green pool table and wooden wall paneling.Stop near the pool table.
Proceed to the kitchen located upstairs, identifiable by its white shaker cabinets and stainless steel appliances, stop near the white table.
Stop on the staircase landing in the middle of the stairs, by the wall with the abstract picture, close to the window.
Please locate the lowest floor bedroom, which has a ceiling fan and a striped bed.
Proceed to the second floor and enter the study room featuring a bookshelf, a printer, a comfortable office chair and an iMac computer.
Go all the way down the stairs and stop at the bottom.
Please go upstairs to the studio featuring an integrated drafting table and a wooden ceiling, stop near the drafting table.
Go to the first floor and enter the bedroom with the large white bed and the attached bathroom featuring white tiled floors and a red sliding door. Stop near the white bed.
Please go to the kitchen area on the first floor, which features dark cabinetry and white marble countertops, and you need to stop beside the cabinet.
Please go upstairs, past the sleek metal railing, to the area with the wall-mounted TV, and you need to stop near the TV.
Go and stop near the white door on the second floor.
Go and stop beside a L-shaped beige sofa on the lowest floor.
Enter the room located at the lowest level of the building, identifiable by its wooden desk and the distinct window overlooking the outdoors, and you need to stop near the wooden desk.
Please stop midway up the wooden staircase, next to the metal railing.
Please go to the bathroom on the first floor and stop near the entrance of that room, which features a white bathtub and a large mirror above the sink.
Please go downstairs from your current location along the staircase to the level below, and stop in the comfortable living room with two red armchairs and large windows.
Go upstairs and stop near the red bed next to the staircase.
Go all the down to the lowest floor and stop near the toilet, facing the mirror.
Please go upstairs and stop in the middle of the stairs, you can see the light grey wall on the left and a window showing a bright blue sky.
Head to the top floor and stop next to the bed on the left side of the stairs.
Proceed to the highest level and locate the office with white window blinds and a row of storage cubbies.You need to stop near the gray chair.
Go all the way down the stairs and stop near a brown sofa at the lowest floor of the building.
Head upstairs to the middle floor and stop in a dining room near the brown large table.
Go to the third floor of the building and stop beside an L-shaped brown sofa and a classic TV.
Go to the highest floor and stop near the clothing area in the other bedroom.
Please go to the kitchen on the second floor and locate the oven next to the telephone.
Go to the working space near the computer and the printer on the first floor.
Go to the first floor and stop beside a round table with yellow flowers on top.
Go and stop in the bathroom on the lowest floor.
Go upstairs and stop near the working desk, where you can see a computer.
Go to an empty room with a square window and a clock, stop near the clock.
Please proceed to and stop at the dining room on the first floor, where there is a wooden dining table covered with a blue and white tablecloth.
Please go to the bathroom with blue tiles and a white bathtub on the first floor. You need to stop beside the bathtub.
Go and stop near the washing machine on the lowest floor.
Please ascend to the topmost floor, enter this bedroom with wooden furniture, and stop by the headboard.
Please navigate to the second floor and stop at this room furnished with an office chair and black storage cabinets.
Go through the stairs and stop halfway down the stairs.
Please go downstairs, entering the room with the piano bench covered in fluffy material, and stop next to the large glass door.
Please proceed to the kitchen on the first floor and locate the silver refrigerator.
Please go upstairs to find the dining room on the next level with the long wooden table and large wooden hutch.
Please go upstairs to the bedroom, the one with the cozy white bedding and the bedside lamp. Stop beside the white bedding.
Go to the highest floor and stop at the bedroom with grey bedding and a fan on top of the ceiling.
Please go down to the second floor and locate the fireplace in the area near the window. Stop beside the fireplace.
Please go to the lowest floor and find the bedroom with a brown wooden nightstand and a table lamp. It is situated just near the end of the staircase.
Please go down the stairs all the way to the end, and enter the room equipped with a drum set. You need to stop beside the drum set.
Please go to the double stainless steel ovens at the middle level of the building in the kitchen and set the preheating temperature.
Go all the way down the stairs and stop at the end of the stairs.
Go all the way up the stairs to the highest floor and stop at the end of the stairs.
Please proceed to the highest floor to find the bathroom with the louvered blinds and stop beside the glass shower.
Please go downstairs to this wooden-floored porch, where you can see the outdoor bench through the glass doors.
Please ascend to the area above the living room where you might find a cozy reading nook or a private lounge. You need to stop beside the L-shaped sofa.
Go to the lowest floor and find an elliptical machine and a shelf cluttered with various items.
Go all the way up to the highest floor and stop in the bedroom near the grey and white striped comforter. You can also see a dark wooden tall dresser in the room.
Please navigate to the highest floor with the window, and then stop in the central area of the room where the round rug and armchair are located.
Please go to the kitchen on the second floor and retrieve the tableware from the dark cabinets next to the stainless steel stove.
Go all the way down the stairs to the bottom, to the area on the lowest floor with the computer and the cabinet. Stop beside the L-shaped table.
Go all the way up towards the highest floor and stop at the end of the stairs.
Please proceed to the second floor and stop inside the main living room where the large screen television and dark wood entertainment center are located.
Please proceed to the topmost floor and find the bedroom with dark walls, a large bed, and a bedside lamp. You need to stop beside the bed.
Go halfway up the stairs and stop midway on the staircase, facing the window-pane-like decorations on the wall, and await further instructions.
Go all the way up to the highest floor of this building to find this bedroom with a large window and wooden furniture. Stop beside the brown bed.
Please go downstairs to the lower level, and stop beside the comfortable black armchairs and enjoy the magnificent view outside the floor-to-ceiling windows.
Please go downstairs and stop at the middle landing of the staircase, right next to the decorative vase with dry branches and red flowers.
Please proceed to the open-plan living area on the first floor, near the large wooden dining table and sofa. You need to stop beside the wooden table.
Please proceed to the kitchen on the first floor, locating the white cabinetry and stainless steel refrigerator area against the wall.
Go to the bathroom with the built-in bathtub on the first floor.You should stop beside the bathtub.
Please go upstairs to the living room, and stop near a TV supported by a wooden console and a large L-shaped sofa area.
Descend downstairs to the laundry area, identifiable by the white wall cabinets and the washing machine on the right. You need to stop beside the washing machine.
Please stop at the middle of the staircase, possibly at a landing, next to the central abstract painting.
Go all the way up the stairs and stop in the hallway alcove with the decorative shelves and the large circular art piece, leading to the bedroom.
Go down the stairs and stop near the wall featuring the large sunburst decorative mirror.
Go to the lowest floor and stop in the master bedroom where a large woven chandelier is suspended above the bed. You need to stop beside the bed.
Please go upstairs to the area identifiable by the two artworks depicting beach scenes and the grey and white toned wall.
Please proceed to the second floor to the bathroom area where you will see the space with the glass shower enclosure. You need to stop beside two white sinks.
Go down the stairs and stop where you can see the elegant tree painting on the subtly textured, light-colored wall.
Please proceed to the topmost floor, and find the room with the Marilyn Monroe pop art painting. You need to stop beside the painting.
Please go to the folded section in a bedroom on the top floor of the building and stop beside it.
Please proceed to the second floor; the destination is this bathroom featuring a white curved bathtub and a sink.
Please proceed to the dining table on the ground floor, where there is wooden flooring. You need to stop beside the white ceramic plates.
Please navigate to the bedroom on the second floor, where the bed is placed by the window, and there are bookshelves and a black chair on the right side.
Please go to the bathroom on the first floor, which has a white bathtub and a pink shower curtain.
Please go to the kitchen and stop beside the refrigerator on the ground floor.
Go to the second floor and stop near the two open white doors at the end of the stairs.
Please go down to the lowest floor and stop near the bathroom with a toilet, sink, and shower stall.
Go up the stairs and stop halfway.
Go down the stairs and stop near the fireplace on the first floor. It is situated close to the window.
Proceed to the second floor, then stop in the kitchen featuring light gray cabinets and a stainless steel refrigerator.
Go to the fireplace on the second floor and stop near the outlets on the wall.
Please proceed all the way down to the lowest level, then stop at this seating area with the yellow armchair and distinctive side table.
Please proceed to the third floor and stop near the cozy bedroom with two windows and vibrantly colored throw pillows.
Go to the bedroom identified by its grey matte on bed and large windows facing outwards on the third floor. You need to stop near the bed.
Please navigate to  and stop near the central area on the second floor. This area features comfortable white sofa and fireplace.
Go upstairs and stop near the wet bar area with a water sink and several glass bottles.
Go all the way down the stairs and stop near the white door. You can see the outside view through the door.
Go down the stairs and stop near the drills on the table in the room with the large storage shelves.
Go to the second floor and stop near a wooden desk with a lamp on the surface of the table. You can see two empty paintings on the wall.
Head to the third floor and stop in a bedroom near the bed. You will find this bedroom with a white crib and a large white bed.
Please go to the highest floor and find the room with the colorful "GEBHR" letters and proceed near the top bunk.
Please go all the way down the stairs from the third floor to the lowest floor. You need to stop at the end of the stairs.
Go and find a room full of mechanical devices on the ground floor. You need to stop near the utility room filled with paint cans.
Go all the way to the highest floor of the building, you need to stop at the place where you can a find dark dresser and vintage lamp.
Stop at halfway down the stairs on your way to the second floor.
Please proceed to the first floor and locate the living room area with the large white shag rug, a white TV stand, and a floor lamp.
Please go downstairs, to the floor below, and stop at the area with wooden flooring, four artworks along the wall, and a geometric pattern rug.
Please proceed to the highest floor and enter the bedroom where you will find a bed with white linen and two nightstands.
Go to the kitchen area on the second floor and stop near the water sink. You can see the street view from the window.
Go halfway down the stairs and stop at the landing. You can see a painting beside you.
Go to the living room on the first floor and stop near the black desk area with the photo frame and two small figurines.
Go to the room with a large brown sofa and a light-colored wooden table. You need to stop near the sofa.
